key_phrases: Money. For Operation costs and artist pay.
Don't tie money to specific events or cultural exploitation or for non-profit entities only.
Theaters and Venues and Artists need money to pay rent, pay staff and fix equipment and furniture.
Putting up rules that tie funding to very specific programming and/or a narrow window of acceptable expenses makes all of this pointless.
I can't tell you the amount of times i had to create a project to justify funding when all I needed was to pay our staff and our rent.
barriers_identified: requirement to create projects just to justify funding
solutions_proposed: Allow funding for operational costs and artist pay
Do not restrict funding to specific events or non-profit entities
Remove rules tying funding to narrow programming or expenses
